meanings.definition: To join together or connect pieces to form a whole.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys piecing together puzzles on rainy days.
meanings.sent2: The tailor is piecing the fabric to make a beautiful dress.
meanings.sent3: Piecing the clues together, the detective finally solved the mystery.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like scattered puzzle pieces, and she spent years piecing them together.
meanings.sent5: The artist meticulously pieced together the mosaic, creating a stunning masterpiece.

meanings.definition: The act of putting together fragments or parts to create a unified whole.
meanings.sent1: The piecing of the quilt took hours of careful work.
meanings.sent2: His favorite hobby is the piecing of model airplanes.
meanings.sent3: The piecing of the jigsaw puzzle was interrupted by the playful puppy.
meanings.sent4: In the play, the piecing of the evidence led to the surprising twist.
meanings.sent5: The piecing of the map revealed the hidden treasure location.
